job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Our team is currently remote through the summer, however this role will be based in Columbus with flexible working conditions once we return.&nbsp;For most, having reliable personal transportation is crucial for economic progression. However, while the process of buying a vehicle has gotten easier for many, the experience hasn't improved for the 1 in 5 Americans with less than perfect credit.&nbsp;   Beep is changing the way our nation's most underserved population finances and buys vehicles. This role will work directly with Engineering, Design, and Product to build a new kind of online car financing and buying experience.&nbsp;   The roleAs a Software Engineer at Beep, you will use the latest technologies to build an e-commerce platform for vehicles, operational tools, and a data platform to drive our systems. You’ll collaborate with a distributed team to design complex solutions and are comfortable with ambiguity. We’re specifically looking for someone with front-end expertise to help us build a scalable front-end architecture and to optimize our the user experience.   Responsibilities  - Implement web interfaces/applications using Angular, XHTML, CSS, and JavaScript   
  - Lead the front end development efforts by instituting best practices and ensuring front end code quality across the team.   
  - Work closely with the entire product team to define feature specifications and build the next generation of products   
  - Complete and test medium to large features (each with many tasks) independently without guidance   
  - Proactively identify and drive changes as needed for assigned codebase, product area and/or systems   
   What you needMinimal Qualification  - 3+ years of relevant professional software engineering experience   
  - Have built and launched delightful, scalable products with designers, other devs, and product managers   
  - Expertise in Angular/typescript and HTML/CSS in a production environment   
  - Experience integrating with APIs   
  - Experience with AWS, Bitbucket, and GitKnowledge of back-end web technologies such as JavaScript   
  - Experience writing front-end test coverage (jest for unit, cypress for e2e) and an understanding of NoSQL databases (we're using MongoDB) are a plus   
   Preferred Qualification  - B.S. or M.S. Computer Science or related field
